data.eml:eml: Calappa exanthematosa Alcock & Anderson, 1894, as a valid species of box crab from the Indian Ocean (Crustacea: Decapoda: Calappidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ng, Peter K. L., Lai, Joelle C. Y., Ghotbeddin, Negar, Safaie, Mohsen (2011): Calappa exanthematosa Alcock & Anderson, 1894, as a valid species of box crab from the Indian Ocean (Crustacea: Decapoda: Calappidae). Zootaxa 3042: 1-14, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.201406
